Review Text: I was given a discount for this product for a review.  I like the feeling of this product and I did see a slight change in color of just a few stretch marks I have but not the change that I was really hoping for that may be that all my stretch marks are old and I have had them for 20+ years, that may play a roll in the results.
Review Title: Maybe, Maybe Not

['FOUR FAMILIAR BEAUTY AND AGING TROUBLES - WHICH DO YOU WANT TO OVERCOME?', "- Dark Circles? - Puffy Eyes? - Crow's feet? - Discoloration?", 'Now You Can Reverse the Effects of Aging with Natural Ingredients', "Our natural, potent anti-aging eye serum is your solution. It's made with 20% hyaluronic acid and 5% vitamin C which are scientifically proven to reduce wrinkles, fine lines and to stimulate collagen.", 'There have always been two types of eye serums: - Short Term for tightening and plumping the delicate skin around your eye and - Long Term serum which infuses nutrients deep into your skin to repair the damaged cells taking 2 to 3 months to show improvement.', 'We have combined these two serums into one.', "You won't believe the amazing results in less than 3 minutes, but wait the full 3 months and be even more amazed.", 'We use Manuka Honey and all of the vitamins, trace minerals and nutrients that your eye tissue cells need to repair themselves.', 'Special Agents and Moisture Magnets', 'We have special agents that go deep into your skin and wake up your collagen producers and tell them to get back to work.', 'We also use moisture magnets that pull moisture particles out of the air and trap them in your cells giving you the instant youthful look you want in minutes.', 'Natural ingredients sit in a soothing aloe vera base. We never use water, mineral oil or alcohol in our products. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Focus on Makeup & Skincare**: The user maintains a strong interest in both makeup and skincare, with an emphasis on effective treatments for skin concerns, demonstrating a holistic approach to beauty.
- **Preference for Quality & Efficacy**: They value high-quality products that deliver real results without excessive marketing hype, favoring natural ingredients and scientifically backed formulations to achieve a youthful appearance.
- **Positive Outcome Orientation**: The user appreciates products showing tangible improvements, which supports their commitment to mastering new beauty techniques and practices.
- **Learning Curve Acknowledgment**: They recognize that some products may require a learning phase but remain motivated by positive outcomes from consistent use.
- **Affordability & Accessibility**: Affordability continues to be a priority, seeking effective solutions that enhance their beauty routines without sacrificing quality.
- **Inclusive Utility**: The user looks for versatile products applicable to various skin types and concerns, ensuring broader accessibility within their regimen.
- **Experimental Mindset**: Recent interactions indicate a willingness to explore new products, even those that may not initially meet high expectations. Their recent experience reflected an appreciation for product texture and gradual results despite some limitations.

Overall, this user demonstrates a commitment to efficient, natural, and affordable beauty solutions, remaining open to exploration and mastery for optimal results.
